dict.acceptation: 表现，表示，表达；表情，脸色，态度，腔调，声调；[数]式，符号；词句，语句，措辞，说法；

sent.orig: The expression rule recursively calls itself indirectly when it invokes the factor rule.
sent.trans: expression规则在调用factor规则时，间接地调用自身。

sent.orig: The expression of gastrin had no relationship with dukes stages, PCNA expression and p53 protein expression.
sent.trans: 胃泌求表达和Dukes分期、PCNA,p53蛋白的表达无相关性。

sent.orig: COX-2 expression was positively correlated to both p-Stat3 expression and p-Stat5 expression in ESCC.
sent.trans: COX-2、p-Stat3及p-Stat5三者的表达之间呈正相关。

sent.orig: An expression followed by a semicolon. An expression statement causes the expression to be evaluated.
sent.trans: 一种语句，由后接分号的表达式构成。表达式语句用于表达式的求解。

sent.orig: Newspaper reports about bank in a banking crisis in Russia use used that expression, they expression.
sent.trans: 报纸发表在俄罗斯银行危机使用了这个词汇。
